title: Smart Data Models - WindTurbineType1or2IEC
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Generator model for wind turbine of IEC Type 1 or Type 2 is a standard asynchronous generator model.  Reference: IEC Standard 614000-27-1 Section 6.6.3.1.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be WindTurbineType1or2IEC

WindMechIEC.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Wind mechanical model associated with this wind generator type 1 or 2 model. Default: None

WindProtectionIEC.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Wind turbune protection model associated with this wind generator type 1 or 2 model. Default: None
